'''Thunder Pellet''' is an event currency for the [[Thunder Sojourn]] Event, obtained during the first three acts: [[Thunder Sojourn/Bolt Blitz|Bolt Blitz]], [[Thunder Sojourn/Lightning Round|Lightning Round]] and [[Thunder Sojourn/Weaving Lightning|Weaving Lightning]].
